metadata.title: CVE-2021-4322 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in DevTools in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowedan attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted Chrome Extension. (Chromium securityseverity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
